statements: DELETE FROM ImagingData WHERE treatment_effectiveness = TRUE;
DELETE FROM ImagingData WHERE patient_id = 123 AND treatment_effectiveness = true;
DELETE FROM ImagingData WHERE time_point_1_data = 'abnormal' AND time_point_2_data = 'normal';
DELETE FROM patient_images WHERE patient_id = 101 AND imaging_timepoint < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM treatment_status WHERE treatment_effectiveness = 'Excellent' OR patient_id = 102;
DELETE FROM ImagingData_002 WHERE patient_id = 123 AND time_point_002_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PatientDetails WHERE patient_id = 456 AND gender = 'Male';
